wikipedia_page.main: Andrew Thomas Halls (born 20 April 1992) is an English footballer who plays as a defender for Chorley.

response: * Andy Halls (born 1992), English footballer, has played for Stockport, Macclesfield and Chester

With Stockport needing to re-build over the summer the club offered five players new one-year contracts.Danny O'Donnell, Daniel Rowe and Andy Halls all accepted the new deals to stay on with the club,

Lewis was called up to the England C squad to face the Cyprus U21 national team on 5 February 2015 along with teammate Andy Halls for a friendly match. He made his debut as a half-time substitute in a 2–1 defeat. As of August 2016, he has not had any further call-ups.
